name: TETMANIA
description:
GAME OVERVIEW: 

Tetmania is a two-player arcade game that is a mixture of Tetris and Breakout. Player goal is to build a Tetris wall against enemy player. When Player finish building, he gets a pad that moves up and down. Defend your side against enemy player and deflect the balls!

CONTROLS:

TEAM:

  • Oguz Bicer: Designer, Project Management, Audio
  • Shubham Beri: Design, Art
  • Giridharahn Punithavalli Balaji Kannan: Programmer
  • Anand Mohapatra : Design, Art
